item.title: 100 Thieves Announce New Adidas Merch Drop
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/100-thieves-announce-new-adidas-merch-drop/

Popular lifestyle and gaming organization, 100 Thieves, revealed a brand-new Adidas Merch line, which is set to drop this November. The drop, which includes shoes, sweatshirts and more, is another perfect example of how very few gaming organizations are doing it like 100 Thieves.

100 Thieves x Adidas Merch Release Date

The new merch by Adidas and 100 Thieves is currently set to release on the following date:

  • November 6, 2024.

Those looking to purchase the drop can do so at the official Adidas website and select retailers. However, 100 Thieves fans will be able to get early access to the new merch at 100 Thieves’s website on November 2, 2024.

100 Thieves has been dedicated to providing gamers with sleek-designed merch for years now in hopes of combining both lifestyle clothing and gaming.

Related: REPORT: 100 Thieves To Build CDL ‘Superteam’ Based on Scrap and HyDra

Everything Included in the Merch Drop

The 100 Thieves x Adidas merch drop marks the second time the two brands have worked together. The drop is being called the Adidas Originals x 100 Thieves Drop 02 and will feature the following clothing items:

  • Long Sleeve Shirt
  • Jacket
  • Shoes
  • Socks

The entire drop fits well together, featuring a black, white and red design pattern.

Here is a gallery of pictures included on the official 100 Thieves website from the merch drop:

It has become quite common for large brands, such as Adidas, to work with gaming companies and organizations. 100 Thieves, however, continues to put out merch like no other.

Will you be purchasing any of the upcoming 100 Thieves merch? While prices have not been revealed, it will more than likely be a bit more on the expensive end.

item.title: PureArts’ $1,300 Assassin’s Creed Syndicate Statue Can Be Pre-Ordered Now
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/ac-syndicate-status-purearts/

PureArts is now accepting pre-orders for one of the most remarkable Assassin’s Creed collectables ever marketed. The ‘Assassin’s Creed Animus: Jacob & Evie’ statue, which stands at a whopping 24 inches tall and weighs a hefty 39lbs, is available to order now and will be shipped Q4 2025.

If you want to secure an exclusive edition that comes with a wearable replica of Jacob Frye’s necklace, you’ll need to move fast – only 250 will be made.

The Greatest Collector

This is an item that only the most hardcore fans will consider copping.

Assassin’s Creed Syndicate was released in 2015 to a relatively stellar reception, emerging as the last of the ‘original formula’ games that were sunsetted when Origins was released in 2017. It saw players assume control of two protagonists – Jacob and Evie Frye – as they explored Victorian London.

The setting was superb, the map was meticulously created, and the story was great – if a little predictable. It had brilliant expansions, and for me, it was on home turf, so that was a bonus.

PureArts’ Jacob and Evie statue is 1/4 scale, which means it’s massive. For $1,299, you’re getting a hefty polyresin figure with incredible details. It has onboard LED lighting, a ‘hyperdetailed’ sculpt, and the most accurate thing you’ll see from the game short of downloading it and pressing ‘play’.

The Jacob and Evie statue joins a long line-up of similar figures from PureArts, who historically has poured effort into creating some of the finest collectables from the world of Assassin’s Creed.

Could you see yourself parting ways with $1,299 in celebration of Assassin’s Creed Syndicate? Let us know on the Insider Gaming forum.
